alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Craighead and northwestern Poinsett Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grubbs, or 9 miles east of Newport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Harrisburg, Weiner, Cash, Waldenburg, Greenfield, Pitts, Valley View, Risher, Gilkerson, Uno, Otwell and Bayou De View State Wildlife Management Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
